document_data.name: Cormul Haythorne
document_data.mainbody: '''Cormul Haythorne''' was a commoner from the town of [[Eveningstar]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Cormul was a dimunitive [[hin]] man with long light brown hair.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, Cormul Haythorne witnessed the abduction of his friend, [[Ana Brabener]] of Eveningstar, by a band of [[drow]] slavers of [[House Szind]]. The drow captured and collared several other villagers, as well as several [[War Wizard]]s and [[Purple Dragons]], but Ana's kidnapping was not a happenstance, the woman possessed a great power hidden within her, she was a ''Strand of the Weave'', a fragment of the [[weave]], collapsed after the death of [[Mystra]], the Goddess of Magic. Cormul told the tale of abduction to a group of heroes from the world of [[Eberron]], who set out to help the abductees, held at an abandoned [[Temple of Mystra (King's Forest)|Temple of Mystra]] in the [[King's Forest]].
